name: Imagine
overview: Imagine is a 3rd-Person Perspective arcade game. The main character of the game is the sorcerer Wormthorp. Examining the Secret Power Crystal Wormthorp falls asleep and wakes up in an unfamiliar place. The player's task is to bring the sorcerer back home. The sorcerer has a spellbook, but spells (such as shoot fog, shoot fire, wall key, make door, make step, hawk, light) are acquired while traveling through the castle. The Keep is protected by hostile creatures. Contact with the enemies means a loss of energy. A fall from a high place ends with an immediate death.
